name: schedule_appointment_ortho
description:
Appointment scheduling. Actions: slots, grouped_slots, book_child, cancel.

slots: Get available times. Returns slots with displayTime.

grouped_slots: For siblings (2+ children). Returns grouped consecutive slots.

book_child: Book appointment. REQUIRES: patientGUID + slot details (startTime, scheduleViewGUID, scheduleColumnGUID). RECOMMENDED: childName (child full name e.g. 'Jake Davis') + childDOB for appointment note.

cancel: Cancel using appointmentGUID.
